title.en: Koori no Hime wa Chiisana Hidamari de Tokasaretai

altTitles.ja: 氷の姫は小さな陽だまりでとかされたい

altTitles.en: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight

altTitles.pt-br: A Princesa de Gelo Quer Ser Derretida por um Pequeno Raio de Sol

description.en: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
description.ja:
多忙な両親に代わり、保育園児の弟妹を世話する男子高校生の青葉実晴は、恋愛をする暇はないが、弟妹と楽しく過ごしていた。ある日、クラスメートで「氷の姫様」と呼ばれるクール美女・水鳥雪の自宅で遊ぶことになった青葉は、「私を笑顔にしてくれませんか？」と水鳥に頼まれて…！？ 

幼い弟妹を大切に想う高校生たちの青春ラブコメ開幕！
description.pt-br: Aoba é um estudante do primeiro ano do ensino médio que cuida de seus irmãos mais novos no lugar de seus pais ocupados e acaba indo a um encontro de brincadeiras para irmãos na casa de sua colega Mizudori, uma beleza fria conhecida como a "Princesa de Gelo".

description.en: When she was hit by labor pain, what greeted her wasn't words of comfort but vile accusations of infidelity. Killed in defense of her unborn baby, she vowed to take revenge on them all… and God granted her a second chance. However, it seems that she's not the only one brought back. Who's that silver-haired guy in mask? Why does he seem to know her every move, yet still willingly provide unconditional help regardless?

altTitles.fr: La vie de fermier dans un autre monde

altTitles.pt-br: A Vida Agrícola em Outro Mundo

description.en: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
description.ja:
闘病の末に命を落とした青年・火楽は、神様によって蘇生され、若返って異世界に転移した。第二の人生を楽しむため、授けられた『万能農具』を手に、異世界で掘って伐って耕して…。

description.tr: Henüz 39 yaşındayken hastalıktan ölen Machio Hiraku'ya başka bir dünyaya gitme fırsatı verilir. Kendisine güç vermek isteyen Tanrı tarafından dileği sorulduğunda sağlıklı bir bedene sahip olmayı, ikinci bir dilek olarak huzur içinde yaşamayı, üçüncü bir dilek olarak yerel dili bilmeyi ve son bir dilek olarak da çiftçi olabilmeyi seçer.

title.en: The Blood Princess and the Knight

description.en:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck…

description.en:
Taepung Shin knows every nook and cranny of his favorite MMO video game Paradiso like it was the back of his hand! However, his gaming adventures suffer an abrupt end after his untimely death. But this is not his last hurrah since he’s reincarnated as Jared, a delinquent lord of a frozen province… in Paradiso! Now, he must brave the world he loved and take advantage of all glitches he knows about and turn himself into the main character of his new solo adventure!

description.fr:
Trop d’heures sup + un jeu vidéo non-stop = game over, décès assuré ! Ce qu’il n’avait pas prévu, c’est de se réveiller dans son jeu vidéo favori… en tant que roi inconnu d’un fief carrément à la dérive. Pas grave, en tant qu’expert du jeu, il va pouvoir utiliser tous les bugs pour s’améliorer, tout ça en un rien de temps ! Et surtout, être sûr que son royaume (et lui accessoirement) survivra lorsque la “Grande Guerre” éclatera.

과도한 업무와 밤샘 게임으로 돌연사?!
눈을 뜬 나를 반긴 것은 게임 <파라디소>의 세계관 속이었다.

그것도 초고도비만의 몸뚱이와 몰락하기 일보직전의 완벽한 듣보잡 엑스트라 영주. 자레드의 몸으로 환생했다!

망할! 소설이나 영화 속 주인공들은 존잘남으로 태어나서 호의호식하며 잘 살던데!

“반드시 정점을 차지하겠어!”

성공하고 성장 할 수 있다면!
버그든 꼼수든 무엇이든 OK!

자레드의 혹독한 다이어트와 버그로 꿀빠는 치열한 현생 도전기가 시작된다!

description.th:
เมื่อเซียนเกม 'พาราดิโซ' อย่างผม โหมงานและเล่นเกมอย่างหนักจนต้องมาจบชีวิตจากการพักผ่อนน้อยนั้น ได้มาถือกำเนิดขึ้นมาใหม่ในร่างของ 'จาเร็ด' ท่านลอร์ดแห่งอาณาจักรคลิเวียที่อยู่ในเกมพาราดิโซ

ทว่าร่างกายของผมในตอนนี้เป็นร่างตุ้ยนุ้ย ไม่เอาการเอางานจนอาณาจักรเละเทะ และความซวยสุดๆ อยู่ที่ในอีก 10 ปีให้หลัง จะมีมหาศึกเทพชนมารอุบัติขึ้น ที่ทำให้ทั่วทั้งทวีปตกอยู่ในความโกลาหล

การจะลดความอ้วนและเพิ่มความแข็งแกร่งให้กับตัวเองภายในเวลาอันสั้นนั้นไม่มีทางเป็นไปไม่ได้แน่! นอกจากจะใช้บั๊กและสูตรโกงจากในเกมมาช่วยทำให้ผมกลายเป็นผู้กล้าที่แข็งแกร่งที่สุดในทวีปได้ยังไงล่ะ!

altTitles.ja: 胎児異変わたしの赤ちゃん

description.en: A collection of six stories from master of horror Hideshi Hino. In the first story, "Unusual Fetus: My Baby", a horror writer jokes with his pregnant wife about her giving birth to a baby lizard, much to her annoyance. But his joke ends up coming true and alizard baby is born. The writer is horrified and tries to get rid of it, but his wife insists on raising it. From there, an unfortunate and bizarre story begins. The second story, "Flower of Flesh and Blood", was turned into a direct-to-video film in the Guinea Pig series  of movies with Hideshi Hino himself directing. American actor Charlie Sheen one day saw a copy of this film on VHS and contacted the FBI, believing it to be a genuine snuff film...

altTitles.th: สงครามนักรบผู้หวนคืน

description.en:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
description.fr:
Après avoir sauvé un monde, le héros Minsu Kim revient sur Terre et découvre qu'il a tout perdu. Il décide donc de détruire le monde qu'il avait l'habitude d'appeler ‘chez lui’. Dans son saccage, il tue le héros Jeongsu Park, mais au lieu de mourir normalement, Jeongsu est transporté dans un autre monde. Après avoir tué le roi démon de ce monde alternatif et grandi en tant que héros, Jeongsu revient sur terre, déterminé à se venger de Minsu. Alors que les deux héros se battent avec le destin de leur pays en jeu, qui sortira vainqueur?

description.ja:
その日、ひとりの勇者によって町が一つ消えた。 異世界を救って現世に帰還した「剣の勇者」。だか彼を待っていたのは、家族の死と自分に向けられた嫌悪、そしてふりかかる不幸。 「こんな世界・・・ぶっ壊してやる」悲しみと狂気に満ちた勇者による破壊が始まる。

title.en: Isekai de Saikyou no Skill o Umidaseta node, Hitasura Musou Suru Koto ni Shimashita. ~ Ore Dake ga Skill no Suuchi o Katte ni Sousa ~

altTitles.ja: 異世界で最強のスキルを生み出せたので、ひたすら無双することにしました。　～俺だけがスキルの数値を勝手に操作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Saikyou no Skill wo Umidasetanode, Hitasura Musou Suru Koto ni Shimashita. ~ Ore Dake ga Sukiru no Suuchi wo Katte ni Sousa ~

altTitles.en: I was able to create the strongest skill in another world, so I decided to be a matchless warrior. ~ I'm the only one who manipulates my status ~

description.en: When I was suddenly summoned to another world by some mysterious identity that said, "Pick three Skill Seeds". But wait, what does 'Skill Seeds' mean instead of just 'Skills'? Realizing the sole difference between the two, I awakened as the other world's first 'Hacker', capable of arbitrarily enhancing skills by manipulating their values! To start, I manipulated the skills of a beautiful girl, Mia, who suffered due to her skills being unsuitable for combat and joined forces with her to surpass those who had looked down on us!

altTitles.th: โอตาคุน่องเหล็ก

description.en:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**

In the distant past, the prosperous nation of Karma waged war against the nation of Spectra, resulting in the creation of an AI that wiped out all humans. Centuries later, Raye, the last surviving human, lives amongst an android society on the outskirts of Karma. On the night of her 13th birthday, her peaceful life is upended when Spectra attacks, destroying her home and forcing her friends to the front lines. Desperate to save everything she loves, Raye calls upon humanity's last bastion: "Sky Striker", the Karma-developed secret technology made to turn humans into the ultimate living weapons.… Unexpected, right? In this newest adaptation of Yu-Gi-Oh, the focus of the plot is not on the card game, but instead the many storylines featured in the cards. The first arc surrounds the Sky Striker series, with more to come in the future.
description.pt-br:
No passado distante, a próspera nação de Kama travou uma guerra contra a nação de Spectra, resultando na criação de uma IA que eliminou todos os humanos. Séculos depois, Raye, a última humana sobrevivente, vive entre uma sociedade de andróides nos arredores de Kama. Na noite de seu aniversário de 13 anos, sua vida pacífica é interrompida quando Spectra ataca, destruindo sua casa e forçando seus amigos a irem para a linha de frente. Desesperada para salvar tudo o que ama, Raye invoca o último bastião da humanidade: "Força Celeste", a tecnologia secreta desenvolvida por Kama feita para transformar humanos em armas vivas definitivas.

... Inesperado, certo? Nesta mais nova adaptação de Yu-Gi-Oh, o foco do enredo não está no jogo de cartas, mas sim nas muitas histórias apresentadas nas cartas. O primeiro arco envolve a série Força Celeste, com mais por vir no futuro.

title.en: Mushoku no Eiyuu: Betsu ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan daga

altTitles.ja: 無職の英雄 別にスキルなんか要らなかったんだが -才能ゼロの成り上がり-

altTitles.en: Hero Without a Class: Who Even Needs Skills?!

altTitles.ru: Бесклассовый герой: Да мне всё равно не нужны эти ваши умения

altTitles.en: The Hero Who Has No Class: I Don't Need Any Skills, It's Okay

description.en: "Classes" are given at the age of 10, and the presence or absence of "skills" greatly affect life. Arel, the son of "Sword Princess" Fara and "Magic King" Leon, has been branded as "Classless"… But even without a job or skills, Arel believes he can persevere through effort.
description.ja:
努力でチートを凌駕する、最強ヒーロー見参!!

10歳で授けられる「職業」と「スキルの有無」が人生を左右する世界で、最強の両親をもつ少年アレルは、なんと「無職」の烙印を押されてしまい……。職とスキルがなくても、努力をすればいい。その思いを胸に、アレルはストイックなまでの努力と筋トレでチートを凌駕する最強ヒーローに!?

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

description.ja: ネコと暮らす不思議な日常。猫創作マンガ

title.en: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo

altTitles.ja: メイデーア転生物語 この世界で一番悪い魔女

altTitles.en: Tales of Reincarnation in Maydare: The World's Worst Witch

altTitles.de: Wiedergeburt in Maydare: Die bösartigste Hexe der Welt

altTitles.fr: Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré
Les contes de la réincarnation en le Maydaré: La pire sorcière en le monde

description.de: Einst rettete Makia, die Tochter einer berüchtigten Hexe, dem Sklavenjungen Thor das Leben. Gemeinsam wuchsen sie auf und erlernten magische Fähigkeiten. Doch dann reißt das Schicksal sie auseinander und Makia landet an einer Magierakademie, wo sie sich schwört, die beste Schülerin ihres Jahrgangs zu werden, um ihren alten Freund möglichst schnell wiederzufinden. Denn es gibt noch ein weiteres Geheimnis, das sie verbindet: Beide kamen ursprünglich aus einer anderen Welt nach Maydare! Dort war Makia eine gewöhnliche, japanische Oberschülerin, die gemeinsam mit zwei anderen Klassenkameraden umgebracht wurde. Wird es ihr gelingen, das Verbrechen aufzuklären und in der neuen Welt ihr Glück zu finden?
description.en:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
description.fr: Makia est une noble dame issue d'une infâme sorcière. Thor, un garçon qui a été élevé avec elle et est venu d'un autre monde, est choisi pour être le chevalier du «sauveur». Les deux sont forcés de se séparer, et pour revoir Thor, Makia vise à être la meilleure élève de Magic School!
description.id: Makia adalah seorang gadis bangsawan yang merupakan keturunan dari seorang penyihir yang dikenal akan kejahatannya. Thor, seorang anak laki-laki yang dirawat bersama makia dan datang dari dunia lain, dipilih untuk menjadi seorang ksatria bagi sang "penyelamat". Keduanya terpaksa harus berpisah karena suatu alasan, dan ketika mereka berdua dipertemukan kembali, Makia bertekad untuk menjadi murid terbaik yang ada di sekolah sihir! ---
description.ru: Загадочный мир под названием «Мейдер». В нём существуют магия, рыцари, драконы и… ведьмы. Макия – юная волшебница из дворянской семьи, являющаяся потомком «Самой худшей ведьмы этого мира», и любительница провести вечерок-другой, изучая новые заклинания. Однажды она встречает необычного паренька, которому даёт имя Тор. Вместе они продолжают углубляться в исследование колдовства и довольно быстро находят общий язык. Это начало длинной истории о девочке, пытающейся понять себя и свои истинные чувства.
description.tr: Makia, kötü şöhretli bir cadının soyundan gelen asil bir hanımefendi. Başka bir dünyadan gelen ve Makia ile birlikte büyüyen Thor, "Kurtarıcı"nın şövalyesi olarak seçiliyor. İkisi de birbirlerinden ayrılmak zorunda kalıyorlar ve Makia, Thor'u bir kez daha görmek için Büyü Okulu'nun en iyi öğrencisi olmayı hedefliyor!

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!  
  
In this handsome harem under one roof by Koji Seo of *Suzuka*, *Kimi no Iru Machi*, and *Fuuka*, which girl will you fall in love with? A seaside love comedy with too many heroines!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".

altTitles.en: I Can Snatch 999 Types of Abilities

description.en:
In a world where superpowers are commonplace, Yang Xifa swore bloody revenge on those who harmed his dear sister. He will use his ability to take away other's powers to build himself up from an innocent bystander to become the leader of a powerful organization. Combining his strength and smarts to defeat the evil-doers, he will collect 999 abilities and become the most powerful hero in the world!

(Source: Anilist (Bilibili, translated))

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

altTitles.ja: 理解のあるカレンちゃん

description.en:
“You’re amazing for being alive another day!”

A Manga about an understanding girlfriend who rewards you with a “log-in bonus” every day.
description.pt-br:
“Você é incrível por estar vivo mais um dia!”

Um mangá sobre uma namorada compreensiva que recompensa você com um “bônus de login” todos os dias.

altTitles.vi: Khoảnh khắc bé nhỏ của Ichika

description.en:
In the spring of her second year of high school, Sendawara Ichika was told by her doctor that she had two years left to live. Three years later, now in her second year of university, Ichika spends her days not knowing when the end will come.

One day, by chance, she is reunited with Yurugi Akifumi -- her former philosophy professor, who quit the university. Once in love with Yurugi-sensei, Ichika has her feelings rekindled upon meeting him again, but...

A story of the fleeting love between Ichika, whose life is growing shorter, and a man quietly trying to disappear.
description.vi:
Mùa xuân lớp 11 đó, Sendawara Ichika được chẩn đoán chỉ còn 2 năm để sống. 3 năm sau, khi trở thành sinh viên đại học năm hai, Ichika vẫn tiếp tục sống những ngày tháng hối hả, bận rộn, nhưng lại không bao giờ biết được đâu sẽ là hồi kết.

Mọi thứ đổi thay khi cô gặp Thầy Yurugi Akifumi. Lần đầu tiên, cô có thể cảm thấy mình còn sống như vậy vì điều gì.  Và rồi Thầy Yurugi lại không còn tới trường nữa, Ichika bị bỏ lại với ngàn câu hỏi trong lòng...

Câu chuyện về tình yêu bé nhỏ thoáng qua của một Ichika có cuộc sống ngày càng ngắn ngủi và một người Thầy muốn lặng lẽ biến mất khỏi nhân gian.
description.pt-br:
Na primavera de seu segundo ano do ensino médio, Sendawara Ichika foi informada por seu médico que ela tinha dois anos de vida. Três anos depois, agora em seu segundo ano de universidade, Ichika passa seus dias sem saber quando chegará o fim. 

Um dia, por acaso, ela se reencontra com Yurugi Akifumi – seu ex-professor de filosofia, que deixou a universidade. Uma vez apaixonada por Yurugi-sensei, Ichika reacendeu seus sentimentos ao encontrá-lo novamente, mas… 

Uma história de amor fugaz entre Ichika, cuja vida está ficando cada vez mais curta, e um homem silenciosamente tentando desaparecer.

description.en: A black mist covers the sky, a ruined city, monstrous creatures, and non-human beings. The ones who delve into all these mysteries are the strange siblings living in such a world—Hakumei and Hinata. And so, their pure yet twisted sibling love is explored.
description.ja:
空を覆う黒い霧、荒廃した街、異形の生物、人ならざる者。
全ての謎に迫るのは、そんな世界で生きる不思議な兄妹・薄明とひなた。
そして描かれる、純粋で歪な兄妹愛――。

title.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villain

altTitles.en: The Reason I Have to Be a Villainess

description.en: After being reborn in a novel, Renee Blair is determined to transform her reputation as "the villainess of the century," which will prevent her death at the hands of Sir Dywen the dragon slayer! But then she learns that the original Renee had been controlled by a pop-up game system of daily missions that forced her to either commit evil deeds or face painful penalties for declining. With this system continuing to affect her as well, can the new Renee outsmart the game and reset her evil legacy?

Following the life of the student newspaper reporter Emiko, these are scary stories of experiences from Miyako High School :  
- Ubawareta Shinzou (Stolen Heart) – The school's mystery club sees the dangerous consequences of an innocent promise concerning heart donation after death between two friends.   
- Kyuuketsu Men (Bloodsucking Mask) – A girl who wears a demon mask from a shrine for a bad-luck-banishing drama club party ends up unable to remove it.   
- Dokuga (Poison Moth) – The science club leader creates a serum to preserve dead bodies perfectly, but it may have other unpredicted side effects.   
- Henshitsu – A couple take shelter from a storm in a strange house with a secret that might prove to be deadly.   
– These stories and many more are found in the two volumes of Kyoufu. [tethysdust]

title.ja: Clevatess - Majuu no Ou to Akago to Shikabane no Yuusha

altTitles.en: Clevatess - The King of Devil Beasts, the Baby, and the Brave of the Undead

altTitles.ja: クレバテス−魔獣の王と赤子と屍の勇者−

altTitles.pt-br: Clevatess - O Rei das Feras Diabólicas, O bebê e a Valente Heróina Morta-Viva

description.en:
It killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…
Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the king of the devil beasts.
Angered by the 13 heroes tasked to take his life, he decided to bring ruin on mankind but get entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.
Is it the tale of a near-ending world close to the apocalypse or the diary of new era childcare?
description.pt-br: Ele matou os heróis, matou o rei, a fera demoníaca então encontrou o “bebê do destino”… Tendo intelecto superior e poder destrutivo, tal é Clevatess, o rei das feras demoníacas. Irritado com os 13 heróis encarregados de tirar sua vida, ele decidiu arruinar a humanidade, mas foi encarregado de um incômodo inesperado: um bebê humano recém-nascido. É a história de um mundo próximo do fim, perto do apocalipse, ou o diário dos cuidados infantis da nova era?

description.en: Kim Cheong-ha, a legendary swordswoman and the Queen of Joseon, meets a tragic end in a palace conspiracy. Reborn as Park Da-jin, a high school student tormented by bullies, she channels her royal spirit into a fierce counterattack. With centuries of wisdom and unmatched skill, she’s ready to deliver justice.

title.en: A Story About Taking in A Strange Creature

altTitles.ja: 不思議な生き物を拾うお話

altTitles.ja-ro: Fushigi Na Ikimono Wo Hirou Ohanashi

description.en: X/Pixiv short by ISHIDA UMI

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou Route ga Nai Nante, Dare ga Itta no?

altTitles.en: There's No Such Thing as a Villainess Route? Not in My Book!

altTitles.id: Siapa bilang rute antagonis gak ada?

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢ルートがないなんて、誰が言ったの？

altTitles.en: Who said there is no Villainess Route?

description.en:
I reincarnated into the world of an otome game as the villainess, “Ophelia.” I thought I'd be able to enjoy a peaceful school life, but to my dismay, I found myself subjected to constant harassment at the hands of the wicked, vindictive heroine; and to top it all off, I’m plunging headlong into the dreaded Bad Ending — hold up, as if I’d meekly submit to such a fate! If that’s how it’s going to be, I’ll tap into the top secret "cheats" known only to those who've played the game and carve out the 'Villainess Route' of my fantasies!! But for some unfathomable reason, the capture targets seem to be doting on me far more aggressively than in the original story…?  


---

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0411fu/)

The heartwarming tale of a cat who wants nothing more than to be loved and the old man who adopts him.  
  
*2nd place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga*  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **A Man & His Cat** (2021)
description.pl: Poruszająca historia o kocie, który pragnął tylko odrobinę miłości i jego właścicielu.
description.pt-br: A história emocionante de um gato que não quer nada além de ser amado e do velho que o adota.

description.en:
Haejoon Goh, who ran from home, and Eunyung Baek, the problem child who lives in a tent.   
These two, who met under terrible circumstances, are forced to live together in an abandoned dormitory.   
This is a story of difficult growth between two people who hate both the dorm and each other.

description.vi: Tiếp tục là manga của D4DJ về Peaky P-key, unit đỉnh nhất của học viện Yoba còn gọi là nhà vô địch tuyệt đối. Sáng tác bởi Ichiro Sakaki, minh họa bởi Mitsuki Meia, manga kể về màn gặp gỡ giữa Kyoko và Shinobu, và sự hình thành của Peaky P-key với sự tham gia của Yuka và Esora.

title.en: My Childhood Friend Who Will Kiss Me in 100 Days

altTitles.id: Teman Masa Kecil yang Akan Menciumku dalam 100 Hari

description.en: Panic disorder, depression, developmental disabilities, PTSD… Japan is said to be a country of hidden mental illnesses, where many patients suffer from mental illnesses without being able to talk to anyone. The suicide rate is one of the worst among developed countries. How has Japan fallen into this kind of situation? Psychiatrist Konosuke Yowai confronts the problems facing Japan's psychiatric care and sheds light on the shadows in people's minds.

After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
description.pt-br: Depois de perder a mãe muito cedo, Hotaru, uma garota cercada de calor e tranquilidade, vê sua vida tomar um rumo dramático. Um evento inesperado a leva ao mundo de “Goze”, colocando-a em um caminho por terras desconhecidas, tendo a música como guia. Dotada por seu talento e com o coração cheio de perguntas, ela embarca em uma jornada em busca de seu pai desaparecido e de sua verdadeira vocação...!

altTitles.th: ไม่เป็นนางฟ้าได้ไหมเนี่ย

altTitles.ja: ガヴリールドロップアウト

description.en: A fallen angel with falling grades! Gabriel White Tenma has descended from heaven to attend high school and guide humanity, but a newly found video game addiction might say otherwise.
description.ru: Габриэль-Тенма Уайт была одной из самых прилежных учениц Академии Ангелов. Но вот пришло время выпуска, и Габриэль отправилась на Землю дабы выполнить порученную ей миссию: показать людям правильный путь и подарить им счастье. Однако, действительно ли всё будет именно так? Не изменит ли ангела новое место, куда она попала?..
description.pt-br:
A comédia desenrola-se em torno de Gabriel White, que se formou no topo da classe na escola de anjos e que frequenta uma escola humana na terra em busca de conhecimento, mas, um jogo web atrai toda a sua atenção e acaba decidindo que dá muito trabalho ir para outros lugares.  
  

[ 1° TEMP. DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 5, Cap 39.] ( Porém pulou os capítulos 29 e 38, além disso o episódio 12 é original. )

description.en:
In the middle Heian period, a small island called Onishima is isolated from civilization.
As a young girl, Torago was playing with her sister, Tana, when she disappears into the sea unexpectedly.
However, it wasn't Torago's fault, but the fault of another boy who was playing with them.
Torago and that boy grew up with guilt, and later ended up together, but one day a woman who looks like “Tana” appears in Onishima...
description.es:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.
De niña, Torago estaba jugando junto al mar con su hermana, Tana, cuando esta desapareció por causas ajenas a su voluntad.
Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...
description.ja:
平安時代中頃、文明から隔離された小さな島「鬼島」。
トラゴは幼少時代、実姉「タナ姉え」と海辺で遊んでいるとき、自分のせいで「タナ姉え」を行方不明にしてしまう。
だが、それはトラゴの過失ではなく、一緒に遊んでいたもう一人の少年の過失だった。
トラゴと少年は共に罪悪感にさいなまれながら成長し、後に結婚するが、ある日「タナ姉え」に似た女が鬼島に漂流してきた…。
description.es-la:
A mediados del periodo Heian, la pequeña isla de Onishima está aislada de la civilización.
De niña, Torago estaba jugando junto al mar con su hermana, Tana, cuando esta desapareció por causas ajenas a su voluntad.
Sin embargo, no fue culpa de Torago, sino de otro niño que jugaba con ellas.
Torago y el chico crecen juntos, ambos llenos de culpa, y más tarde terminan juntos, pero un día una mujer que se parece a «Tana» aparece en Onishima...

description.en: Lim Soojung, a devoted fan, is devastated when her beloved male idol is linked to a dating scandal. To her surprise, the rumored girlfriend, Kim Sara, shows up in her life! Their hilarious encounter begins.
Hyeun is a genius dancer but has stage fright, and Suhyun is a beginner dancer but is not afraid of the stage. This is the Street Dance growth story of two different dancers!
description.ko:
천재 댄서이지만 무대 공포증을 지닌 혜은과,
초보 댄서이지만 무대를 두려워하지 않는 수현.
서로 다른 두 댄서의 스트릿 댄스 성장기!

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

Ayato, a boy who spent his childhood being raised by an overseas terrorist organization, is troubled by the fear of his own power and his own worth. The school that came to scout him is... "Murder School". A vivid dark action that fights the good and evil of life with the words "There is a life that can be saved by killing"!
Re: imboss

altTitles.ja: マネマネ にちにち

description.en: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
description.fr: Dans une certaine lycée se trouve un certain club et ses trois managers. Bien qu'anodins, des jours comme on n'en trouve nulle part ailleurs voient le jour ! Dessiné par Yamamoto Souichiro : une toute nouvelle histoire de jeunesse sur le thème du sport !
description.tl: Sa isang partikular na paaralan ay may isang natatanging klab at ang tatlong tagapamahala nito. Bagama't hindi kapansin-pansin, ay nagsimula na ang mga araw na kahit saan ay hindi matatagpuan! Iginuhit ni Souichiro Yamamoto, ay isang bagong kuwento ng mga kabataan sa larangan ng isports!
description.pt-br: Numa determinada escola reside um determinado clube e as suas três ajudantes. Embora normais, dias que não podem ser encontrados em nenhum outro lugar começaram! Desenhado por Yamamoto Souichirou, é uma nova história juvenil de campo esportivo!

クラスの子に催眠？をかけられた

altTitles.ja-ro: Kurasu no ko ni Saimin o Kakerareta?
Kurasu no ko ni Saimin? o Kakerareta

title.en: Everyone Is from Another World, Except Me!?

altTitles.ja: 僕以外全員転生者かよ

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku igai Zennin Tenseisha ka yo

altTitles.en: Everyone Except Me Is A Reincarnator!?

description.en:
Loco is a novice adventurer who begins his journey to save his sister Natty, who is cursed by a monster into an eternal slumber.

At an adventurer's guild, he meets Taiga, who was given extraordinary abilities when he was reincarnated from another world! He also meets Souya and Mia, who were also reincarnated from another world and have cheat abilities, but something happens that shocks even them!

An entertaining and poignant otherworldly fantasy featuring a party of a novice adventurer, Loco, and three reincarnated characters from another world!
___
Extra Edition Links:
- [Official Raw (X)](https://twitter.com/summeryuma/status/1753356644682207438)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0D7VDMWV5)

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

altTitles.ja: メドゥーサ奴隷を買った

description.en: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
description.es-la:
No estoy seguro de por qué decidí comprar una medusa en el mercado de esclavos, pero desde entonces ella parece ser muy proactiva con su petición de que remueva la venda de sus ojos. 
¿Acaso busca petrificarme? ¿O de verdad quiere verme con sus propios ojos?
description.pt-br: Não tenho certeza de por que decidi comprar uma medusa no mercado de escravos, mas desde então ela insiste muito para que eu remova a venda de seus olhos. Ela está tentando me petrificar? Ou ela realmente quer me ver com seus próprios olhos?

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

description.en: Tomo Aizawa was able to successfully confess to her crush Junichirou Kubota. There is only one problem: He just sees her as his buddy. He thought that she was a boy until they went to middle school together, because her grade school was in a different school district.
